summary: This is an email chain from July 12, 2019, discussing a potential male victim of Jeffrey Epstein who claims to have information about high-level government figures, including a former president. The email involves FBI personnel and a former FBI agent facilitating contact for an interview.

persons.name: Mal& (FBI)
persons.context: CC'd on the email as someone leading the investigation; referenced as a point of contact for the potential victim.

persons.name: Sean
persons.context: Referenced as the person to whom contact information for the potential victim should be passed so his team can follow up.

persons.name: Mil=
persons.context: A former agent originally in Newark who is referencing potential victims and facilitating contact between an investigative journalist friend and the FBI.

persons.name: Linda Collins Smith
persons.context: Mentioned as a now-murdered Arkansas senator who had information on child trafficking; the email author had brief contact with her about a CPS corruption case.

connections.description: Mil=, a former FBI agent, is communicating with current FBI personnel (Mal&) to refer a potential victim and information related to the Epstein case.
Mil= had brief contact with Senator Linda Collins Smith about a CPS corruption case prior to the senator's murder.

events.title: Email referral of potential Epstein victim
events.description: A former FBI agent emails current FBI personnel to refer a potential male victim of Jeffrey Epstein who claims to have information on high-level government figures and the trafficking process.

events.title: Murder of Arkansas Senator Linda Collins Smith
events.description: Arkansas Senator Linda Collins Smith was murdered; she reportedly had information on child trafficking. The FBI is noted as working her murder case.

keyFacts: A potential male victim of Jeffrey Epstein is identified, described as credible and possessing information about the entire trafficking process and specifics on high-level government people, including one former president.
The information is being referred to the FBI by a former FBI agent via an investigative journalist friend who had been working with a now-deceased retired female cop on human trafficking.
The email mentions that the female retired cop who was initially involved is now deceased.

The email author also references brief contact with murdered Arkansas Senator Linda Collins Smith, who had information on child trafficking, suggesting a possible nexus of concerns about child exploitation at high levels.
